string.value: Let's to talk to #b#p2050002##k with the new #t4031927#.

While hiding the #t4031927# behind your back, you approached #p2050002#. #p2050002# says nothing is going on but says something completely different through the ultrasonic waves. \n\n According to the #t4031927#, it seems that the Grays have broken the console which controls #o6220001#. Oh my... no wonder #o6220001# has been acting out of control.

The #p2050002# becomes flustered as soon as he recognizes the #t4031927# you're holding, but informs you that #m221000000# will be in danger if nothing is done to control #o6220001# soon. Let's go tell Dr. Kim.
You... you're back. My human friend, it's nice to see you again but I really don't have time to chat. Perhaps next time? \r\n#L0# #b(Activate the Wave Translator)#k

You can ask about Zeno all you want but I don't have anything to say. The seniors are in charge of Zeno, so I don't know anything.(Hmmm, this one is suspicious. This one is up to something. What is it that this one knows? And how?) \r\n#L0# #b(Wave Translator activated)#k

More importantly, what happened to you, my human friend? You're not cooperating with the hypocrites in the #m221000000#, are you? (This must be the deed of that #p2050001#... I mustn't reveal anything.) \r\n#L0# #b(Wave Translator activated)#k

The Grays do not want to hurt the humans. We want to get closer. Don't you know?(I can't believe us Grays broke the console that controls Zeno. The humans will belittle us if they find out... and we can't have that happen!) \r\n#L0# #b(Wave Translator activated)#k

Don't be afraid of our guidance. The Grays are on human's side. We will lead the humans to their glory. (The Grays must always remain superior to the humans. So we can never tell them anything.) \r\n#L0# #b(Wave Translator deactivated.)#k

My human friend. Won't you join the Grays? ...? What's that look on your face? Humans usually make that face when they are surprised... Wait a minute... you're making that face because... Is tha... that a Wave Translator?!
What? It's not a #t4031927#? Liar! I saw it with my own eyes!
A Wave Translator?! Our thoughts were being read?! No! NO WAY! Grrrr, the humans! Delete everything from your memory! Oh my... I can't believe we were fooled.
What's done is done. Yes, Zeno is unmanageable! It's true that Grays are in danger because of Zeno... but the Omega Sector isn't an exception!

If Zeno goes out of control, not only will the Grays be in danger but the entire Omega Sector will be annihilated! We can't be the only ones to go! The Grays and the Omega Sector will be blown up together!!!
